name: Holodrive
description: Holodrive is a super fast-paced collectable 2D multiplayer shooter. Create your robot, customize it and jetpack your way to victory!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.6GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible card with 512MB (minimum Nvidia GeForce 8000, AMD Radeon HD 2000) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card Additional Notes: You'll need to have an active internet connection to play.
recommended_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
